titleStmt.title: The suspence upon sixty six: or The astrologers prerogative. Reader, begin don't stop nor halt it, when you'av' read a line, press forward to the end; ...Deserving nought, but if you'l add to it, twill please him well to hear some can remit.
titleStmt.author: E. G.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You daily sluggards, you that view the skies".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
